metadata.title: CVE-2019-6284 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibSass 3.5.5, a heap-based buffer over-read exists inSass::Prelexer::alternatives in prelexer.hpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6284` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass0 - 3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsass package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
